definition: appearance/portrait/picture/government minister/(physics) phase/(literary) to appraise (esp. by scrutinizing physical features)/to read sb's fortune (by physiognomy, palmistry etc)
each other/one another/mutually/fret on the neck of a pipa 琵琶[pi2 pa5] (a fret on the soundboard is called a 品[pin3])

sentences.english: Although I only am the unrequited love, no matter what, I had loved you.
sentences.chinese: 雖然我只是單相思，不管怎樣，曾經我是愛過你的。

sentences.english: When section of unrequited love ended, I did not know that was says the sound regret to her.
sentences.chinese: 當一段單相思結束，我不知是跟她說聲抱歉。

sentences.english: In summer of 2011, single Taurians will experience unrequited love.
sentences.chinese: 到了2011年夏天，單身牛牛會經歷單相思。
你是希特勒單相思的情人。

sentences.english: He falls in love very easily and often it's unrequited love.
sentences.chinese: 他總是很快愛上某人，而且往往是單相思。
你是希特勒單相思的情人。

sentences.english: I begin to suspect that this is a one sided love.
sentences.chinese: 我開始懷疑，這是一種單相思。

sentences.english: From that evening on, Jack kept thinking of Mary and suffering from one-sided love.
sentences.chinese: 從那天晚上起，傑克一直想著瑪麗並且爲單相思所苦。

sentences.english: I think it's a story about an unrequited love.
sentences.chinese: 我覺得這是一個單相思的故事。

definition: to make a terrible scene (idiom)/to throw a tantrum
pinyin: yi1 ku1 er4 nao4 san1 shang4 diao4

definition: when views are irreconcilable, it's a waste of breath to continue discussion (idiom)
pinyin: hua4 bu4 tou2 ji1 ban4 ju4 duo1

definition: both sides are willing/by mutual consent
to ask a question, already knowing the answer
lit. to stand with each foot in a different boat (idiom)/fig. to have it both ways/to run after two hares/(especially) to have two lovers at the same time
better to just get the pain over with, rather than prolong the agony
pinyin: chang2 tong4 bu4 ru2 duan3 tong4

definition: lit. firing after the horse/fig. belated action/giving advice in hindsight
lit. a good horse doesn't turn around and graze the same patch again (idiom)/fig. once you've moved on, don't go back again (romantic relationship, job etc)/leave the past behind
pinyin: hao3 ma3 bu4 chi1 hui2 tou2 cao3

definition: restrain your grief, accept fate (condolence phrase)
